summary: Opeth is a Swedish metal band formed in 1990, known for blending folk, blues, and jazz with heavy metal. Their music often features acoustic guitar, death growls, and dramatic changes in volume. Lead singer and guitarist Mikael Ã…kerfeldt has led the band since 1992. Opeth has released 13 studio albums and toured worldwide. Their albums "Ghost Reveries" (2005) and "Watershed" (2008) were big hits, reaching top charts in many countries. The band has sold over 1.5 million albums and DVDs worldwide.
title: Opeth
